result.eng: I admit that I have made a mistake.
result.html: admhaím go ndearna mé botúnI admit that I have made a mistake.
result.ponchtml: adṁaím go ndearna mé botúnI admit that I have made a mistake.

result.ga: an bhfeiceann tú an botún seo
result.orig: an bhfeiceann tú an botún seo
result.html: an bhfeiceann tú an botún seoCan you see this mistake?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfeiceann tú an botún seoCan you see this mistake?

result.eng: It is clear that we have made a mistake.
result.ga: is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againn
result.orig: is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againn
result.html: is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againnIt is clear that we have made a mistake.
result.ponchtml: is léir go ḃfuil botún déanta againnIt is clear that we have made a mistake.

result.eng: I haven't found a single mistake.
result.ga: níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháin
result.orig: níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháin
result.html: níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháinI haven't found a single mistake.
result.ponchtml: níor aimsiġ mé oiread is botún aṁáinI haven't found a single mistake.

result.eng: You made a mistake in the exam.
result.ga: rinne tú botún sa scrúdú
result.orig: rinne tú botún sa scrúdú
result.html: rinne tú botún sa scrúdúYou made a mistake in the exam.
result.ponchtml: rinne tú botún sa scrúdúYou made a mistake in the exam.

result.ga: thug mé an botún faoi deara
result.orig: thug mé an botún faoi deara
result.html: thug mé an botún faoi dearaI noticed the mistake.
result.ponchtml: ṫug mé an botún faoi dearaI noticed the mistake.

result.ga: tá an botún ceartaithe agam
result.orig: tá an botún ceartaithe agam
result.html: tá an botún ceartaithe agamI have corrected the mistake.
result.ponchtml: tá an botún ceartaiṫe agamI have corrected the mistake.
